title: Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count
descriptions:
Introducing the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils, Pre-Sharpened, 2 HB Soft, Yellow, 30 Count! These pencils are perfect for all your writing and drawing needs. 

Featuring an exclusive #2 graphite formula, these pencils deliver smooth performance and consistent lines. The thick graphite core ensures that your lines are bold and precise. 

The wood used for these pencils is of premium quality, responsibly sourced from managed forests. The pencils have a golden yellow lacquered finish with a matte coating, giving them an elegant and professional look.

With their pre-sharpened tips, these pencils are ready to use right out of the box. No more wasting time sharpening pencils! 

The eraser on these pencils is made from latex-free material, ensuring that it is safe for everyone to use. It removes marks completely without smudging, leaving your work neat and clean. The ferrule of the eraser is in the signature green & gold color, adding a touch of style to the pencils.

Rest assured, these pencils are PMA certified non-toxic, making them safe for both adults and children to use. 

Ticonderoga is a trusted brand with over 100 years of tradition in craftsmanship. They are known for their commitment to quality and excellence. 

These pencils are highly preferred by teachers for their performance and reliability. They come in a pack of 30, ensuring that you have an ample supply for all your writing and drawing projects.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to own these Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils. Order yours today and experience the difference in quality!

It's no wonder that these pencils are preferred by teachers! They are part of the renowned Dixon Ticonderoga family, trusted by educators for their exceptional performance. This pack includes 30 pencils, so you'll always have plenty on hand.

Don't settle for anything less than the best. Choose the Ticonderoga Wood-Cased Pencils for superior quality and performance. Order yours today and experience the difference for yourself!
